query:
WITH token_info AS (
                            SELECT index AS token_idx FROM plt_tokens WHERE token_id = $3
                        ),
                        account_checks AS (
                            SELECT token_idx,
                                COALESCE((SELECT amount FROM plt_accounts WHERE account_index = (SELECT index FROM accounts WHERE address = $1) AND token_index = token_idx), 0) AS from_balance,
                                COALESCE((SELECT amount FROM plt_accounts WHERE account_index = (SELECT index FROM accounts WHERE address = $2) AND token_index = token_idx), 0) AS to_balance
                            FROM token_info
                        ),
                        from_balance_updates AS (
                            INSERT INTO plt_accounts (account_index, token_index, amount, decimal)
                            SELECT 
                                (SELECT index FROM accounts WHERE address = $1),
                                token_idx,
                                $4,
                                (SELECT decimal FROM plt_tokens WHERE token_id = $3)
                            FROM account_checks
                            ON CONFLICT (account_index, token_index) DO UPDATE
                            SET amount = plt_accounts.amount - $4
                            RETURNING amount as from_final_balance
                        ),
                        to_balance_updates AS (
                            INSERT INTO plt_accounts (account_index, token_index, amount, decimal)
                            SELECT 
                                (SELECT index FROM accounts WHERE address = $2),
                                token_idx,
                                $4,
                                (SELECT decimal FROM plt_tokens WHERE token_id = $3)
                            FROM account_checks
                            ON CONFLICT (account_index, token_index) DO UPDATE
                            SET amount = plt_accounts.amount + $4
                            RETURNING amount as to_final_balance
                        )
                        SELECT 
                            token_idx, 
                            from_balance, 
                            to_balance,
                            COALESCE((SELECT from_final_balance FROM from_balance_updates), 0) as from_final_balance,
                            COALESCE((SELECT to_final_balance FROM to_balance_updates), 0) as to_final_balance
                        FROM account_checks
